H0.text: Which German shell-shock victim was taken to Hollywood after the First World War, where he became a star and is said to have died in the arms of Jean Harlow. Erich von Stroheim

H1.text: Which German shell-shock victim was taken to Hollywood after the First World War, where he became a star and is said to have died in the arms of Jean Harlow. Emil Jannings

H2.text: Which German shell-shock victim was taken to Hollywood after the First World War, where he became a star and is said to have died in the arms of Jean Harlow. Conrad Veidt

H3.text: Which German shell-shock victim was taken to Hollywood after the First World War, where he became a star and is said to have died in the arms of Jean Harlow. Rinty

A4.text: Emil Jannings (born Theodor Friedrich Emil Janenz; 23 July 1884 â€“ 2 January 1950) was a Swiss-born German actor who was popular in Hollywood films in the 1920s.

A5.text: He died in 1950, aged 65, from liver cancer.
